room_title: Escape room "Marooned Island Escape" by Riddles Escape Room in Myrtle Beach
review: Riddles escape room is the right mix of puzzles and fun. The puzzles are smart and not overly frustrating. Each room has a great design and makes you feel like you are really trapped in that bizarre location. The best one is the marooned island escape which has some wonderful surprises that you will have to see. The house of CARS is a quick runner up. All the people that work here are invested and bring you the best experience they possibly can. Out of the escape rooms in Myrtle Beach this is probably the best one.

room_title: Escape room "Marooned Island Escape" by Riddles Escape Room in Myrtle Beach
review: Our family of 7 took on the challenge of the Island Escape. There were lots of clues, lots of challenges. We made it out with 8 minutes to spare. I would recommend to anyone. Penny was especially cool

room_title: Escape room "Marooned Island Escape" by Riddles Escape Room in Myrtle Beach
review: Great experience for our first escape room! Friendly staff and the island theme was cool for the area. If we ever make our way back to myrtle beach definitely stopping in again to try the other rooms or the VR escape.
